full_text: OF ereto Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 forking Budget Bureau No. 44-R1301.1. law SUPPLEMENTAL STATEMENT FOR LIVE-AT-WORK JOB OFFERS DATE (Form ES-575B, Supplement 1) INSTRUCTIONS.-An employer submitting an application for Alien Employment Certi- fication, Form ES-575B, for a job for which an alien is required to live at his place of employment, must also furnish the information indicated below. This Supplemental Statement is prepared in an original and one copy and submitted with Form ES-575B. LAU Chuen & Chan Nui 790, Fairfield Circle, Pasadena, California 91106 (Name of Alien) (Address Where Alien Will Reside) 1. Number of persons residing at place of employment: Adults 2 Children 2 Ma 18-15 2. If alien is to live in household of employer, what is gross family income of all adult mem- LIF bers domiciled at place of employment? $ 20,000 per year Number of adults in an earning capacity 1 1101 3. How many bedrooms and bathrooms at place of employment Bedrooms 5 Bathrooms 5 DEG 4. List all deductions to be withheld from alien's salary for Social Security deductions. 5. Will alien be furnished a private room? Yes X No 6. Are there any persons for whom the alien will be required to give special care or atten- tion? If so, please explain None 7. Explain what provision is made for time off for alien 11/2 days off per week plus a garanteed rest period of minimum one-half hours in the afternoon & 2 evenings per week. 8. If opening is to be filled by an alien currently employed by you, state the duties, salary, and the date employment began current employee not an alian 9. If you intend to fill the opening with an alien who is related to you by blood or marriage, indicate the relationship No 10. Attach a copy of written contract, letter of agreement, or other contractural document between the employer and the employment. DATE May 2, 1967 alien SIGNATURE covering specific terms and conditions of U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE : 1966-O-242-217 (Employer or Representative) (Nathaniel Paschall) For sale by the Superintendent of Documents, U.S. Government Printing Office, Washington, D.C. 20402 - Price $1.00 per pad
